summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; accepting and appropriating a donation from the Outdoor Recreation and Education Advisory Council to supplement said Department's camping program for 1974, increasing the budget allowance for object of expenditure "Temporary and Intermittent Employment" in the Program Category "Camping" in the 1974 Budget of said Department, and authorizing certain temporary and/or part time employment in connection therewith.
